com.qualcomm.hardware.stmicroelectronics

Class VL53L0X

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.stmicroelectronics.VL53L0X
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rev2mDistanceSensor

    public class VL53L0X
extends <any>
    VL53L0X implements support for the STMicroelectronics VL53L0x time-of-flight distance sensor.
    See Also:
    STMicroelectronics VL53L0X Sensor
